query.proteaseCount: SELECT COUNT(protease_id) AS count FROM protease
query.proteinCount: SELECT COUNT(protein_id) AS count FROM protein
query.geneCount: SELECT COUNT(gene_id) AS count FROM gene
query.sequenceCount: SELECT count(sequence_id) AS count FROM protein_sequence
query.proteinAccessionToGeneAccession: SELECT p.protein_accession\, g.gene_accession FROM gene g\, gene2protein g2p\, protein p WHERE g.gene_id=g2p.gene_id AND g2p.protein_id=p.protein_id ORDER BY gene_accession
query.sequenceIdToProteinAccession: SELECT p2s.sequence_id\, p.protein_accession FROM protein p\, protein2sequence p2s WHERE p.protein_id=p2s.protein_id
query.peptideFeaturesByProteaseShortName: SELECT pep.sequence_id\, pep.pos_start\, pep.pos_end FROM protease p\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, peptide pep WHERE p.name IN (:proteaseNames) AND p.protease_id=pep2prot.protease_id AND pep2prot.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id
query.peptideSequencesByProteaseShortName: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(seq.aa_sequence\, pep.pos_start\, pep.pos_end - pep.pos_start + 1) AS aa_sequence FROM protein_sequence seq\, peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE seq.sequence_id=pep_feat.sequence_id AND pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseShortNames)
query.signaturePeptideSequencesByProteaseShort: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(seq.aa_sequence\, pep.pos_start\, pep.pos_end - pep.pos_start + 1) AS aa_sequence FROM protein_sequence seq\, peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot\, (SELECT peptide.peptide_id\, COUNT(DISTINCT peptide.sequence_id\, peptide.pos_start\, peptide.pos_end) location_count FROM protease\, peptide2protease\, peptide WHERE protease.name IN (:proteaseNames) AND protease.protease_id=peptide2protease.protease_id AND peptide2protease.peptide_id=peptide.peptide_id GROUP BY peptide_id) proteome_location_count WHERE seq.sequence_id=pep_feat.sequence_id AND pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseNames) AND pep.peptide_id=proteome_location_count.peptide_id AND proteome_location_count.location_count = 1
query.peptideSequenceAndSequenceIdByPeptideSeq: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(seq.aa_sequence\, pep.pos_start\, pep.pos_end - pep.pos_start + 1) AS peptide_sequence\, pep.sequence_id FROM protein_sequence seq\, peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE seq.sequence_id=pep_feat.sequence_id AND pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseNames) HAVING peptide_sequence IN (:peptideSequences)
query.createTemporaryTableGenesAlternativelySp: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE gene_altsplice(gene_id INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY)
query.insertIntoTemporaryTableGenesAlternative: INSERT INTO gene_altsplice(gene_id) SELECT g2pro.gene_id FROM gene2protein g2pro GROUP BY g2pro.gene_id HAVING count(g2pro.protein_id) > 1
query.proteinIdsAlternativelySplicedGenesTrans: SELECT p.protein_accession FROM gene2protein g2p\, protein p WHERE g2p.protein_id=p.protein_id AND g2p.gene_id IN ( SELECT gene_id FROM gene_altsplice )
query.signaturePeptideIdsByProteaseShortNamePr: SELECT pep.peptide_id FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id = prot.protease_id AND prot.name in (:proteaseNames) GROUP BY peptide_id HAVING COUNT(pep.sequence_id) = 1
query.signaturePeptideIdsByProteaseShortNameGe: SELECT pep.peptide_id FROM gene2protein g2p\, protein2sequence p2s\, peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE g2p.protein_id=p2s.protein_id AND p2s.sequence_id=pep.sequence_id AND pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id = prot.protease_id AND prot.name in (:proteaseNames) GROUP BY peptide_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT gene_id) = 1
query.peptideFeatureIdsByPeptideIdAndSequenceI: SELECT peptide_id FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE peptide_id IN (:peptideIds) AND sequence_id IN (:sequenceIds) AND pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id = prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseNames)
query.accessionsAlternativelySplicedGenesTrans: SELECT g.gene_accession FROM gene g\, gene2protein g2p WHERE g.gene_id=g2p.gene_id GROUP BY g.gene_accession HAVING COUNT(g2p.protein_id) > 1

SELECT g.gene_accession FROM gene g\, gene2protein g2p\, protein2sequence p2s WHERE g.gene_id=g2p.gene_id AND g2p.protein_id=p2s.protein_id GROUP BY g.gene_accession HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT p2s.sequence_id) > 1
query.peptideLengthFrequencyByProteaseShortNam: SELECT pep.pos_end - pep.pos_start AS length\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id) FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pf2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pf2prot.peptide_id AND pf2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseShortNames) GROUP BY length
query.sequenceCoverageBySignatureProtease: SELECT prot.name AS signature_protease\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id) AS sigpep_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id)/sigpep_count.total AS sigpep_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id) AS seq_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id)/seq_count.total AS seq_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id) AS pro_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id)/pro_count.total AS pro_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id) AS gene_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id)/gene_count.total AS gene_freq_rel FROM peptide pep\, protein2sequence pro2seq\, protein2gene pro2gene\, signature_peptide sigpep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot\, (SELECT COUNT(sequence_id) AS total FROM protein_sequence) seq_count\, (SELECT COUNT(peptide_id) AS total FROM signature_peptide) sigpep_count\, (SELECT COUNT(protein_id) AS total FROM protein) pro_count\, (SELECT COUNT(gene_id) AS total FROM gene) gene_count WHERE sigpep.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id AND sigpep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND pep.sequence_id=pro2seq.sequence_id AND pro2seq.protein_id=pro2gene.protein_id GROUP BY prot.name UNION SELECT "all" AS signature_protease\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id) AS sigpep_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id)/sigpep_count.total AS sigpep_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id) AS seq_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id)/seq_count.total AS seq_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id) AS pro_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id)/pro_count.total AS pro_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id) AS gene_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id)/gene_count.total AS gene_freq_rel FROM peptide pep\, protein2sequence pro2seq\, protein2gene pro2gene\, signature_peptide sigpep\, (SELECT COUNT(sequence_id) AS total FROM protein_sequence) seq_count\, (SELECT COUNT(peptide_id) AS total FROM signature_peptide) sigpep_count\, (SELECT COUNT(protein_id) AS total FROM protein) pro_count\, (SELECT COUNT(gene_id) AS total FROM gene) gene_count WHERE sigpep.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id AND pep.sequence_id=pro2seq.sequence_id AND pro2seq.protein_id=pro2gene.protein_id
query.sequenceCoverageByPeptideSet: SELECT ":protease" AS signature_protease\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id) AS sigpep_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.peptide_id)/sigpep_count.total AS sigpep_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id) AS seq_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pep.sequence_id)/seq_count.total AS seq_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id) AS pro_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2seq.protein_id)/pro_count.total AS pro_freq_rel\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id) AS gene_freq_abs\, COUNT(DISTINCT pro2gene.gene_id)/gene_count.total AS gene_freq_rel FROM peptide pep\, protein2sequence pro2seq\, protein2gene pro2gene\, (SELECT COUNT(sequence_id) AS total FROM protein_sequence) seq_count\, (SELECT COUNT(peptide_id) AS total FROM signature_peptide) sigpep_count\, (SELECT COUNT(protein_id) AS total FROM protein) pro_count\, (SELECT COUNT(gene_id) AS total FROM gene) gene_count WHERE pep.peptide_id in (:peptideIds) AND pep.sequence_id=pro2seq.sequence_id AND pro2seq.protein_id=pro2gene.protein_id
query.peptideSequence: SELECT pep.peptide_id\, SUBSTR(seq.aa_sequence\, pep.pos_start\, pep.pos_end - pep.pos_start + 1) AS aa_sequence FROM peptide pep\, protein_sequence seq WHERE pep.sequence_id=seq.sequence_id
query.proteomeCoverageForProteaseCombination: SELECT count(distinct p2s.protein_id) as proteome_coverage FROM (SELECT pep.peptide_id\, count(distinct pep.sequence_id) as sequence_count FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pf2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pf2prot.peptide_id AND pf2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name in (:proteaseCombination) GROUP BY pep.peptide_id) peptide_degeneracy\, peptide pep\, protein2sequence p2s WHERE peptide_degeneracy.sequence_count = 1 AND peptide_degeneracy.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id AND pep.sequence_id=p2s.sequence_id
query.genomeCoverageForProteaseCombination: SELECT count(distinct g2pro.gene_id) as genome_coverage FROM (SELECT pep.peptide_id\, count(distinct g2pro.gene_id) as gene_count FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pf2prot\, protease prot\, protein2sequence pro2seq\, gene2protein g2pro WHERE pep.peptide_id=pf2prot.peptide_id AND pf2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseCombination) AND pro2seq.sequence_id=pep.sequence_id AND pro2seq.protein_id=g2pro.protein_id GROUP BY pep.peptide_id) peptide_degeneracy\, peptide pep\, protein2sequence p2s\, gene2protein g2pro WHERE peptide_degeneracy.gene_count = 1 AND peptide_degeneracy.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id AND pep.sequence_id=p2s.sequence_id AND p2s.protein_id=g2pro.protein_id
query.sequenceCoverageForProteaseCombination: SELECT count(distinct pep.sequence_id) as proteome_coverage FROM (SELECT pep.peptide_id\, count(distinct pep.sequence_id) as sequence_count FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pf2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pf2prot.peptide_id AND pf2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name in (:proteaseCombination) GROUP BY pep.peptide_id) peptide_degeneracy\, peptide pep WHERE peptide_degeneracy.sequence_count = 1 AND peptide_degeneracy.peptide_id=pep.peptide_id
query.lastProteinId: SELECT MAX(protein_id) AS id FROM protein
query.lastGeneId: SELECT MAX(gene_id) AS id FROM gene
query.peptideCountForProteaseCombination: SELECT count(pep.peptide_id) FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pep2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pep2prot.peptide_id AND pep2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseCombination)
query.signaturePeptideCountForProteaseCombinat: SELECT count(peptide_degeneracy.peptide_id) FROM (SELECT pep.peptide_id\, count(distinct pep.sequence_id) as sequence_count FROM peptide pep\, peptide2protease pf2prot\, protease prot WHERE pep.peptide_id=pf2prot.peptide_id AND pf2prot.protease_id=prot.protease_id AND prot.name IN (:proteaseCombination) GROUP BY pep.peptide_id) peptide_degeneracy WHERE peptide_degeneracy.sequence_count = 1 GROUP BY peptide_degeneracy.sequence_count
query.peptideMassFrequency: SELECT mass\, COUNT(peptide_id) AS count FROM peptide_mass_temp GROUP BY (mass)
query.signaturePeptideMassFrequency: SELECT mass\, COUNT(peptide_id) AS count FROM signature_peptide_mass_temp GROUP BY (mass)
